Articles.Content: I find myself more and more using exclusively procedural parts in my sandbox game, allowing myself to design my craft exactly how I want it with my own rules without having to be restricted to design limitations due to the small number of available parts in stock. One problem though is that although there was a pack for Saturn-like textures for procedural parts, I still want some more choice ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Is anyone willing to do a few more textures? Something more stock-like (I actually like the stock looks), or maybe more nasa-modern like?

Ooh ooh! Me want! Love that mod!

Maybe even more shapes for the parts? Trusses around parts and such?

There's [Freedom's awesome part texture pack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94606-JebediahKerman42-s-Procedural-Part-Textures!) and also [blackheart's cool textures](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68892) as well. And I assume by the pack with Saturn-like textures you mean Ferram's Saturn/Nova textures, but I'll [link it anyway.](http://www./download/9mi9tjb5akaiaaz/SaturnNovaTexturePack.zip)

In addition to already mentioned:

[OTHOAB textures](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/486/OTHOAB%27s%20textures%20for%20Procedural%20Parts#info) (for auxiliary parts, such as procedural batteries, monopropellant tanks or decouplers)

[MainSailor's textures](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/103761)
Awesome! That's exactly what I wanted. Thanks!
